title: Going to make a viktor montage, suggestions
body:
Hello I'm going to make my first ever montage, of viktor.

1. What type of clips should I put in it? e.g. triple kills, one shotting people, teamfights, outnumbered, etc
2. Any music suggestions?
3. Any experienced montage makers got any suggestions?

Making it on iMovie cause that's what I know how to use and will suffice. Thanks in advance!

replies.body: i was so good with viktor then stopped playing him. now I go negative and can't handle how squishy he is

Did you stop playing him before the rework?

Because that might be part of it.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rKK9cP8i,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-05-30T16:48:49.056+0000)
>
> Did you stop playing him before the rework?
> 
> Because that might be part of it.

 i played him after rework for 2 months straight when it came out and stopped now when i go to play him i can't really do it.
Different build in play, Defensive , offensive. i want to know the difference :)
I'm trying to find some software because OBS is lagging my fps down to 30 and under first but yeah thanks for the suggestion.

Use this song, guaranteed phenomenal hit.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d8WRraRyquU

Making of Cyborg, from Ghost in the Shell (the original scene contains nudity even though it's completely nonsexual but I guess i still can't put it up here).

______________

Depending on which aspect you wanna emphasis about Viktor, you put more of that into the video accordingly, but still cover a range of things that he does so the entire vid won't be just him doing the same thing over and over, it's good to have some varieties here and there.

It's better to pick a song and try to align what's going on in the action to match the beats and the pace of the music in the background.

Yeah it's a bit hard to get teamfights though since OBS drops my FPS to 30 and under from 60 :/

I think I'll make a one shot compilation like those rengar ones. Thanks for the ideas.

Considering the fact that your making a montage, it doesn't nessecarilly need to be as the game is running, it could all be through replay software then recorded onto OBS (unless your trying to do it with your in game reactions i guess?)

If you decide to do replays, a quick tip, keep a notepad for times of good plays
I'm on mac and I can't really use LOL Replay and when I download op.gg replays they save as .cmd files. All the tutorials for opening op.gg files on mac show them as .bat or .sh

i thought LOL replay had a mac version (i might be wrong on that.)

I'm sure if you looked there is another replay software for mac, or just get a PC ;)
Lots of clips of Viktor dying should do it.
